parameters.description: This is the number of pages that will be generated for the report.
This sets the first page to show in your multipage report.
Using a direct_html entry and no pages should show the direct_html as the report.
If > 0, this makes a number of tiny downloadable files.

cells.source:
from biokbase.narrative.jobs.appmanager import AppManager
AppManager().run_app(
    "NarrativeTest/report_html_links",
    {
        "num_pages": 1,
        "initial_page": 1,
        "include_direct": 0,
        "num_files": 3
    },
    tag="dev",
    version="25496c5ebfdaec8045b5fd9049aeff5efd4a3834",
    cell_id="e6f39431-0fbd-4f19-948c-ba4952bedd60",
    run_id="c2962417-e69a-4602-90dc-0326023dd0bb"
)

parameters.short_hint: Add some text for your report

parameters.description: Your report will show this being checked or not
parameters.short_hint: Show this off in your report

cells.source:
from biokbase.narrative.jobs.appmanager import AppManager
AppManager().run_app(
    "NarrativeTest/report_example",
    {
        "text_input": "blah!",
        "checkbox_input": 1
    },
    tag="dev",
    version="b4c5dfc69ae106b3aa1d34b8bd21b6cb4e1c39aa",
    cell_id="db8c9ab1-ee30-4091-a350-78443108f4a2",
    run_id="f90c9f55-3504-4ed8-951c-4e457d4cc15e"
)
